summary: Dark and true ENB, gives Skyrim a harsh look. AMD 7700 HD = 60 FPS
descriptionHtml:

[u][size=4]Update: Dark and Tender ENB - Resurrected

[/size][/u][size=4][size=3]A new and updated[/size][u] [/u]version of the ENB to work with v.305!

[img width=827,height=474]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/73834-7-1470673206.jpg[/img]

[img width=838,height=471]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/73834-0-1470673207.jpg[/img]

[img width=847,height=476]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/73834-8-1470673206.jpg[/img]
[/size]


[u][size=4]Installation

[/size][/u][size=4][size=3]1.[/size][/size][size=4][size=3] [size=2]Download[size=3] v.236 or higher[/size] from here: http://enbdev.com/index_en.html[/size][/size]

[size=2]2. Take from the "Wrapper Version" the "d3d9.dll" file and place it
into the main skyrim folder[/size]
[/size]
3. Download the ENB

4. Unzip the folder

5. Drop the content of the folder into your main "Data" folder

6. Enjoy :D




[size=4]
[u]Recommended [/u][/size]

I use these mods while playing:

Pure Water

Enhanched Lights and FX

Book of Silence

Alternative Rock Textures

Real ICE - All in one

Visible Windows

Etheral Clouds
